name: Role Of The Dice (TimBer)
description:
This game was made for the GTMK Game Jam 2022 in 48 Hours.

How To Play

Defend the base in the middle of the map from waves of enemies. Use the 3 dice to fight against your opponents. 

Each side of the dice has a specific role in the battle. After throwing a dice, the role it lands on activates. The role stays active for a short time, after which the dice can be thrown again to get a new role. 

PS: Throwing the dice into enemies can be a good way to deal damage

Roles:

  • Red Triangle -> Weak but fast shooting turret
  • Orange Diamond -> Slow but very strong sniper turret
  • Purple Circle -> Damage Aura in area around dice
  • Green Heart -> Healing Aura, which can refill the health bar of the base, in area around dice
  • Blue Square -> Slows down enemies dramatically in area around dice
  • White Cross -> Increases lifetime of nearby dice
Controls

[Left Mouse Button] - Pickup/ Drop/ Throw  Dice

[R] - Restart
